Heart Rate Monitor

  • Tell me more

HeartRate Monitor is a tool to monitor the reactions e
of a person when watching a video that trigger with extrem.

The platform was developed to have a fun time, obtained through
the use of sensors in specific places in the human body.

Make it your own

Let it grow

Expand the system easily by integrating new sensors.

You control it

For a better results,puts the electrodes in the right places

  • Dashboard

  • Sensors reporting live and historical data

  • ECG Monitor

Check live or historical sensors metrics

Check the heartbeat conditions and other metrics in real-time on the platform.
All the data you need to know your heartrate.

Sensors metrics analytics

Get more of your sensors data!
The platform is always processing the data and calculating the average value for all the sensors.

Unlimited possibilities with an easily extensible platform.

Heartrate Monitor platform will revolutionize the farmer’s ability to monitor and actuate on his farm, and reduce labor and maintenance costs.

The Plan

M4

May 6

Sensors' data flowing through broker.

M5

May 20

Data coming from sensors should be saved on a database.
UI should correctly display values coming from sensors and the historic data. UI should allow device management,
an historic view of data should be presented. Data processing.

M6 Demo

June 3

Basic users management should be done.
All features should be implemented.
Basic acceptance testing and system logging.
Final Presentation.

M6 Docs

June 13

Final delivery.
